mapper.insert: insert into gonggu values( gonggu_seq.nextval, #{gongguName}, #{gongguWriter}, #{price}, #{type}, #{num}, #{category}, #{content}, #{photo1}, #{photo2}, #{photo3}, #{link}, sysdate, ${sendTime}, ${openTime}, ${endTime}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, default, default, null,sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from gonggu where status=1 order by pullup_at desc
select count(*) from gonggu where status=1

SELECT GONG.GONGGU_NO ,GONG.GONGGU_NAME ,GONG.PRICE ,GONG.PHOTO1 , (SELECT MAX(LOCATION_NAME) FROM LOCATION LCTN , PARTI_TB PRTB WHERE GONG.GONGGU_NO = PRTB.GONGGU_NO AND PRTB.LOCATION_CODE = LCTN.LOCATION_NO) LOCATION_NAME FROM GONGGU GONG WHERE GONG.STATUS = 1
mapper.update: update gonggu set gonggu_name=#{gongguName}, price=#{price}, type=#{type}, num=#{num}, category=#{category}, photo1=#{photo1}, photo2=#{photo2}, photo3=#{photo3}, link=#{link}, send_time=${sendTime}, open_time=${openTime}, end_time=${endTime}, latitude=#{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude}, update_at=sysdate, location_no=#{locationNo} where gonggu_no=#{gongguNo}
mapper.select: select * from gonggu where gonggu_name like '%' || #{gongguName} || '%'
select count(*) from gonggu where status=1 and gonggu_name = '%' || #{gongguName} || '%'
